entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
